title.rendered: Panaya: Best Practices for Maintaining Healthy Salesforce Architecture

content.rendered:
Best Practices for Maintaining Healthy Salesforce Architecture
May 5, 2020Panaya


Panaya Presents

Best Practices: Maintain Healthy Salesforce Architecture
Join us as Salesforce MVPs and Technical Architects, Meighan Brodkey and Guillermo Pedroni, discuss their tried and true best practices for maintaining healthy Salesforce Architecture. Get tips on planning security, keeping your design simple – from the start, data cleanup and mapping and more.

The Presenters



Meighan Brodkey

Practice Manager/Technical ArchitectMeighan is a technical architect and the leader of the Seattle Women in Tech User Group leader. With over 450 Trailhead badges, Meighan is continuously working on increasing her Salesforce knowledge and helping others do so as well. She is working on becoming a Certified Technical Architect currently. She has spoken around the world about Salesforce.  She gives back to the community via Events, Twitter, the Trailblazer Community, OhanaSlack, her User Group and blog.

Meighan’s LinkedIn


Guillermo Pedroni

Founder / CEO / Technical Solutions ArchitectGoal oriented business solution architect with proven experience implementing & overseeing SaaS solutions. Well versed in digitizing & streamlining business processes. Possess an in-depth understanding of emerging technologies & their commercial applications. Always looking to improve business processes to increase efficiency by leveraging the power of the cloud. He is very passionate about all things within the Force.com  ecosystem. FF

Guillermo’s LinkedIn

Resources


Webinar Re-Run

Register for June 2nd follow up run

Register Here

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.

img.alt_text: Automation Hour: Flows, Bots, and AI… OH MY!!!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Admin & Dev Recap
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join us as 3 Salesforce MVP‘s, Eric Dreshfield, Mike Martin, and Meighan Brodkey, bring Dreamforce ‘19 to you. Our Dreamforce19 recap panel will answer the questions you want to know about the best admin/dev sessions, favorite tips and takeaways and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: My Top Salesforce Books
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Must have books in your collection as an Architect on the Force.com Platform. Major Props to the Authors - Tameem Bahri, James Hutcherson, Ahsan Zafa, Mike King, Andy Fawcett and by Eric Freeman & Elisabeth Robson for creating my top 5. https://www.amazon.com/Becoming-Salesforce-Certified-Technical-Architect-ebook/dp/B08NXV3H15/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-1 https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Data-Architecture-Management-effectively/dp/1801073244/ref=sr_1_3_sspa?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-3-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzRDY0Mk9SWENLSE1GJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMzU1ODU1WEY4MzlYSTRaVVhPJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAyMzg4NzQxRUxTTUFUVk1VREZPJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Architects-Handbook-End-End-ebook/dp/B08TLJYTSZ/ref=sr_1_2_sspa?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-2-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzRDY0Mk9SWENLSE1GJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwMzU1ODU1WEY4MzlYSTRaVVhPJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAwMTU1MTYzNVNYRENONDJUM0lDJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Solution-Architects-business-consumer-ebook/dp/B09BZY4G4B/ref=sr_1_8?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-8 https://www.amazon.com/Salesforce-Lightning-Platform-Enterprise-Architecture-ebook/dp/B07SYJBV7P/ref=sr_1_7?keywords=salesforce+architect&qid=1642336468&s=digital-text&sr=1-7 https://www.amazon.com/dp/149207800X/ref=redir_mobile_desktop?_encoding=UTF8&aaxitk=68b51899314bf7e95d9c6163e5917f86&hsa_cr_id=3731486690201&pd_rd_plhdr=t&pd_rd_r=074aec07-6e18-4ad6-8573-aade53769f14&pd_rd_w=ncCU5&pd_rd_wg=bnsNa&ref_=sbx_be_s_sparkle_mcd_asin_0_img

jetpack-related-posts.title: Vancouver User Group: Become a Community Cloud Security Expert
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join me to talk Community Cloud security from scratch or audit your existing. Better how the types of sharing work together, how to decide when to use each, and best practices for implementing a…
